root.title: Phishing Pattern ISO in Archive
root.description: Detects cases in which an ISO files is opend within an archiver like 7Zip or Winrar, which is a sign of phishing as threat actors put small ISO files in archives as email attachments to bypass certain filters and protective measures (mark of web)
root.author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

falsepositives.item: Legitimate cases in which archives contain ISO or IMG files and the user opens the archive and the image via clicking and not extraction
